p: We recognize the limitations inherent in drawing conclusions based on a review of western-centric sources, which may well have failed to capture the full scope of litigation. Most importantly, legal cases from certain regions and countries are not all included in the databases searched. While nine translated climate laws and policies are reported from China, including the “National Plan for Tackling Climate Change 2014–2020”, no case litigation is reported, even though there is indication such cases have taken place in China. Similarly, three climate laws and policies are reported from Saudi Arabia including the “Saudi Arabia Vision 2030” and 26 from Vietnam, yet no cases are reported for either country.
